com.enhancell.remote

Interface Device


  • public interface Device
    Device class provides access to the network parameters measured by a UE. In addition device reports the changes in the devices state, for example when call is connected and disconnected. Further, this class provides methods for controlling the UE. Parameter and state changes are reported using a Device.Listener interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Device.DeviceStates
      DeviceStates class contains the state flags for describing the UE's state.
      static class  Device.Errors
      Errors class contains defines for device errors.
      static class  Device.Events
      Events class contains the constants for event IDs.
      static interface  Device.Listener
      Listener interface for observing changes in the UE's parameter values and state changes.
      static class  Device.LockStatus
      This class lists the currently active bands and bands that are supported by the current device.
      static class  Device.ScriptStates
      ScriptStates class contains the constants for observing the progress of the scripts.
      static class  Device.StateMessages
      StateMessages class contains constants for messages that indicate state change
      static class  Device.Systems
      Systems class contains the constants for system IDs.
      static class  Device.Value
      This class wraps the parameter values reported by the UE.

      • dial

        void dial(java.lang.String number,
          java.lang.String polqaReferenceFile,
          java.lang.String polqaMode)
        Makes the UE dial the specified number.
        Parameters:
        number - phone number.
        polqaReferenceFile - Filename of the audio wave file used to compare with audio from the line.
        polqaMode - Sets polqa mode to "nb" = Narrow Band or "swb" = Super Wide Band.

      • hangup

        void hangup()
        Hangs up the active call (if one exists).

        void sendSms(java.lang.String number,
             java.lang.String text)
        Sends an SMS message.
        Parameters:
        number - phone number
        text - text to be sent.

      • setControl

        void setControl(boolean control)
        Requests for control over the device. Before host has control of the device it cannot send the commands such as dial. Only one host can control a device at a time.
        Parameters:
        control - whether to request for control (true), or release it (false).

      • getColor

        int getColor()
        Returns the device color.
        Returns:
        device color.

      • startMeasurement

        void startMeasurement(java.lang.String filename,
                      java.lang.String guid,
                      java.lang.String masterId,
                      int fileRoll)
        Starts a measurement.
        Parameters:
        filename - measurement filename.
        guid - GUID of the measurement.
        masterId - ID of the host.
        fileRoll - duration of file roll timeout in minutes. If zero or less, then no file rolling.

      • stopMeasurement

        void stopMeasurement(java.lang.String notes)
        Stops the measurement.
        Parameters:
        notes - notes to be added to the measurement.

      • pauseMeasurement

        void pauseMeasurement()
        Pauses the measurement.

      • resumeMeasurement

        void resumeMeasurement()
        Resumes the measurement.

        Starts the selected script.

           throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:

        data - the XML script data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if transfer fails.

      • configureAutoAnswer

        void configureAutoAnswer(int method,
                         int duration,
                         java.lang.String audioSample)
        Configures auto answer mode
        Parameters:
        method - auto answer method: 1, 2, 3 or 4.
        duration - duration before hangup: -1 (no auto-answer), 0 (answer, never hangup) or x (answer for x duration).
        audioSample - filename of the audio sample to play.

      • muteCall

        void muteCall(boolean mute)
        Choose whether to mute line during call
        Parameters:
        mute - mute the line (true) or unmute it (false)
